title: Its a shame to say ' This is the new Exorcist '
review: How can people compare this boring movie with the best horror movie of all time The Exorcist?... Hereditary has zero scares, zero story, zero creepy atmosphere. Boring from the begining till the end...

title: To Unique to be just Horror
review:
I liked chapter one, but loved chapter two. This movie is to good to be just a Horror movie, because it has it all: Horror, Jumpscares, Fantasy, Humor, Action...
This movie is UniqueAnd ofcourse Pennywise is creepy as hell
